QuestData.Title: Mangelrath
QuestData.Description: The demonic beast that stands before ye, must be the one that devoured ol' Brambley...$b$bJust look at it, lying there with a full belly! I canna abide it any longer, $n! We must slay the foul creature and avenge Brambley!$b$bWe've come this far already, $c.$b$bAre ye with me?!
QuestData.RewardText: It's good to see a friendly face, I don't know how much longer I could have held out on my own!
